creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: two young women in brilliant, ornate kimono walk in sync, holding their front skirts up with PL hands; shrine grounds in background with richly saturated orange, white, and green details; blossoming pink cherry tree just behind the two Maiko
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Maiko
